posts.post_content:
Boy oh Boy (as Grandpa Gross used to say), There seems to be quite a lull in mid-tier backs available these days .....  

I "think" it's because there are so many new "back" collectors.  I'd say a year and a half ago, I could think of 3 or 4 collectors actively seeking these cards.  Now it seems there are 3 or 4 times that many.  The old double edge sword:  Great for the interest, not so great for availability. 

Anyway, my wants/needs are limited, but if you don't ask, you don't know .... ;)

Here is what I'm looking for:

1 -- SL Hindu -- Ellam, Foster, and Mullaney

2 -- Any AB, Cycle, EPDG, or Tolstoi (as available):  Cross (:eek:), Knabe, McGlynn, Shaw, Prov., Taylor, Thomas.

3 -- Any EPDG, Hindu, OM, or Sov.150 (as available):  Alperman, Mathewson/white, Pastorius (to replace SC150/649ops); Bridwell, no cap, Jones, hips, Lajoie, port.,  (to replace Sov.350s)

4 -- Also any lower grade Hindus that I don't have ...........

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Easy as that ----- :rolleyes:

Thanks, Scott

Bump .................  A "few" cards found .... :) 


..... hopefully a "few" more .... ;)



Fun, fun, Scott :rolleyes:
